sentences.sContent: The temperature dependence of exchange bias and coercivity of ferromagnetic layer and antiferromagnetic gain layer is discussed.
sentences.sContent_eng: The temperature dependence of exchange bias and coercivity of ferromagnetic layer and antiferromagnetic gain layer is discussed.
sentences.sCn: 讨论了铁磁反铁磁双层膜中交换偏置和矫顽场随温度变化的关系。

sentences.sContent: A method for the computation of local magnetic force in saturated ferromagnetic materials is proposed, based on FEM and virtual work principle.
sentences.sContent_eng: A method for the computation of local magnetic force in saturated ferromagnetic materials is proposed, based on FEM and virtual work principle.
sentences.sCn: 研究考虑铁磁介质饱和时基于有限元和虚位移原理的局部电磁力算法。

remMethod.val: ferr(铁) + o + magnetic(磁的) → 铁磁的
